item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。美国股市屡创新高，欧洲股指却步履维艰，苹果公司再次超越微软，日本央行引发日元新一轮疲软。以下是交易员们正在谈论的话题。【原文：Good morning. Record-setting US stocks stand out against struggling European indexes, Apple overtakes Microsoft again and the BOJ sparks new yen weakness. Here’s what traders are talking about. — David Goodman】

item.title: PGIM 坚持看跌国债的观点，押注美联储仍可能加息
item.description: 虽然债券交易员重燃了对美联储降息的押注，但 PGIM Fixed Income 表示，央行实际上可能会重新倾向于加息。【原文：While bond traders have rekindled bets for interest-rate cuts by the Federal Reserve, PGIM Fixed Income says the central bank may actually lean back toward a hike.】

item.title: 德意志银行因西班牙衍生产品销售遭罚款
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）向客户出售金融衍生品，但客户后来表示不了解这些产品，并因此蒙受了巨大损失，德意志银行正准备在西班牙接受高达 1,000 万欧元（1,070 万美元）的罚款。【原文：Deutsche Bank AG is bracing for a fine of as much as €10 million ($10.7 million) in Spain after it sold derivatives to clients who later said they didn’t understand the products and suffered steep losses as a result.】

item.title: 特斯拉和埃克森股东大会见证挪威 17 亿美元基金的募集之声
item.description: 特斯拉公司和埃克森美孚公司最近召开的股东大会标志着挪威主权财富为其投票决定辩护的方式发生了重大变化。【原文：The recent shareholder meetings of Tesla Inc. and Exxon Mobil Corp marked a step change in how Norway’s sovereign wealth justifies its voting decisions.】

item.title: Transnet 将为大众汽车和南非其他汽车制造商提供更多铁路服务
item.description: Transnet SOC Ltd.表示，该公司正在商谈在东开普省格格贝哈港口与该国商业中心豪登省之间增开列车，以更好地连接这两个汽车制造中心。【原文：Transnet SOC Ltd. said it’s in talks to run additional trains between a port in Gqeberha in the Eastern Cape province and the country’s commercial hub of Gauteng to better link the two automotive manufacturing hubs.】

item.title: 欧洲柴油市场因努力吸引美国供应而更加看涨
item.description: 欧洲柴油市场正在出现紧缩迹象，柴油相对原油的溢价达到了两个月来的最高点。【原文：Europe’s diesel market is showing signs of tightening, with the fuel’s premium over crude oil reaching a two-month high.】

item.title: Archegos 案审判引发 2 万亿美元家族办公室纠纷
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）前首席执行官拉尔夫-哈默斯（Ralph Hamers）在解释该银行如何在投资公司 Archegos Capital Management 内爆之后损失数亿美元时显得闷闷不乐。【原文：Ralph Hamers, the former chief executive officer of UBS Group AG, looked sullen as he explained how the bank lost hundreds of millions of dollars after the implosion of investment firm Archegos Capital Management.】

item.title: 通胀率接近 2%，欧洲央行森特诺敦促审慎对待利率问题
item.description: 欧洲央行理事会成员马里奥-森特诺（Mario Centeno）表示，欧洲央行必须谨慎地将利率调至既不刺激经济也不限制经济的水平—；这表明官员们在再次降息之前还需要一些时间。【原文：The European Central Bank must be prudent in bringing interest rates to levels that neither stimulate nor constrain the economy, Governing Council member Mario Centeno said — suggesting officials will take some time before cutting again.】

item.title: 德拉吉展示瑞典在欧盟推动更具生产力经济中的作用
item.description: 欧洲中央银行前行长马里奥-德拉吉（Mario Draghi）说，瑞典是欧盟在推动提高生产力的同时为穷人保留一个强大的安全网方面可以效仿的榜样。【原文：Former European Central Bank chief Mario Draghi said Sweden is an example for the European Union to emulate in its push for more productivity while retaining a robust safety net for the poor.】

item.title: 马克龙当选呼声令法国股市跌至多年来最差一周
item.description: 本周，投资者对法国总统埃马纽埃尔-马克龙（Emmanuel Macron）进行了迅速而尖锐的抨击，因为他要求举行临时议会选举，引发了国家财政进一步恶化的警告，甚至引发了对新一轮欧元危机的担忧。【原文：Investors inflicted a swift and sharp rebuke on French President Emmanuel Macron this week as his calling of a snap parliamentary election ignited warnings of a further deterioration in the nation’s finances and even fears of a fresh euro crisis.】

item.title: 芬兰称更多俄罗斯战机卷入领空入侵事件
item.description: 芬兰当局怀疑共有四架俄罗斯军用飞机参与了周一的侵犯领空事件，而不仅仅是一架。【原文：Finnish authorities suspect a total of four Russian military aircraft were involved in the airspace violation on Monday instead of just one.】

item.title: 法国发展银行（SFIL）在选举焦虑中撤回债券销售
item.description: 在即将到来的大选前的一周里，法国政府债务暴跌，法国一家公共开发银行推迟了绿色债券的销售。【原文：A French public development bank has delayed the sale of a green bond after a week that saw the country’s government debt tumble ahead of upcoming elections.】

item.title: 印度五月贸易逆差扩大，进口继续攀升
item.description: 由于国内需求强劲，进口继续扩大，印度 5 月份的贸易赤字有所扩大。【原文：India’s trade deficit widened in May as imports continued to expand on the back of strong domestic demand.】

item.title: 政府出售债券，中国信贷恢复扩张
item.description: 由于政府加大了债券销售力度，中国的信贷在上个月出现了罕见的收缩，5 月份又恢复了扩张。【原文：China’s credit returned to expansion in May following a rare contraction the previous month, as the government ramped up bond sales.】

item.title: 通胀疲软让债券交易员看淡美联储鹰派政策
item.description: 欢迎收看 "每周快讯"（Weekly Fix）。我是彭博社亚洲市场直播团队负责人加菲尔德-雷诺兹。【原文：Welcome to the Weekly Fix, the newsletter that’s always depending on data, rather than dots. I’m Garfield Reynolds, Bloomberg’s Markets Live team leader in Asia.】

item.title: 这一次，利率上调将促进消费和经济发展
item.description: 据估计，美国家庭从超过 13 万亿美元的短期资产中获得利息收入。【原文：US households receive interest income on more than $13 trillion of short-term assets, according to one estimate.】

item.title: 全球贸易流动受阻，新加坡船用燃料销量激增
item.description: 由于红海的紧张局势阻碍了全球贸易，越来越多的船只停靠新加坡枢纽，新加坡的船舶燃料销售量也随之上升。【原文：Ship-fuel sales in Singapore rose, with an increasingly large fleet of vessels calling at the hub as tensions in the Red Sea snarl global trade.】

item.title: 据称银行敦促香港对可转换债券和股票回购采取更灵活的态度
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，大型投资银行正在要求香港证券交易所允许在香港主要上市的公司同时进行股票回购和可转换债券销售。【原文：Major investment banks are asking Hong Kong’s stock exchange to allow companies with a primary listing in the city to do share buybacks and convertible bond sales simultaneously, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 土耳其计划限制房地产投资信托基金几十年来享有的免税待遇
item.description: 土耳其政府正准备限制房地产投资信托公司数十年来享受的企业免税待遇，这也是土耳其政府为收紧财政而提出的一项广泛建议的一部分。【原文：The Turkish government is preparing to limit a corporate tax exemption enjoyed for decades by real estate investment trusts as part of an extensive proposal geared at fiscal tightening.】

item.title: 香奈儿亿万富翁之子成立价值 1.1 亿美元的私募股权投资公司
item.description: 香奈儿的一位亿万富翁的儿子正在组建一个团队，帮助管理他的私募股权投资企业，因为巨额的奢侈品财富正在流向第四代。【原文：The son of one of Chanel’s billionaire owners is building a team to help run his private equity venture as a huge luxury goods fortune trickles down to the fourth generation.】

item.title: 韩国聘请银行进行两年多来的首次美元债券销售
item.description: 韩国授权银行进行一次潜在的美元债券销售，如果进行的话，这将是韩国政府两年多来的首次美元债券销售。【原文：South Korea mandated banks for a potential dollar bond sale, which would be the government’s first in more than two years, if it proceeds.】

item.title: 韩国为何禁止卖空，何时能解禁？
item.description: 在韩国，监管机构延长了对卖空借入股票行为的禁令，卖空者正面临热议。监管机构的目标是阻止大型投资银行从事可能削弱公众对市场信任的非法交易行为。虽然韩国股市在 11 月禁令实施后出现反弹，但涨势很快就消退了。批评者说，这降低了市场的透明度，也降低了对全球投资者的吸引力。【原文：Short sellers are facing the heat in South Korea after regulators extended a ban on the practice of selling borrowed shares. Their goal is to stop big investment banks engaging in illicit trading practices that could erode public trust in markets. While South Korean shares rallied after the ban was imposed in November, the gains soon faded. Critics said it makes the market less transparent, and less attractive to global investors.】

item.title: 希腊总理准备限制希腊最受欢迎岛屿的游轮数量
item.description: 希腊总理基里亚科斯-米佐塔基斯（Kyriakos Mitsotakis）表示，现在是时候限制游轮造访希腊最受欢迎的岛屿了，这是政府在疫情过后应对 "过度旅游 "影响的第一个举措。【原文：Prime Minister Kyriakos Mitsotakis said the time has come to place restrictions on cruise ships visiting Greece’s most popular islands, the government’s first move to cope with the effects of “over-tourism” in the post-pandemic period.】

item.title: 德根 "加密货币交易员的日常工作
item.description:
如何利用数字货币赚大钱和赔大钱。【原文：

How to make and lose a fortune with digital money.

】

item.title: 电动汽车关税是欧中贸易紧张局势的最新表现：时间表
item.description: 欧盟宣布对中国制造的电动汽车征收关税，引发了人们对贸易战可能爆发的担忧。【原文：The European Union has announced tariffs on China-made electric vehicles, raising concerns that a trade war could break out.】

item.title: 埃及利用液化天然气市场缓解酷暑影响
item.description: 埃及计划购买多年来最大规模的液化天然气，以加大力度缓解夏季酷热带来的能源短缺问题。【原文：Egypt plans to make its biggest purchase of liquefied natural gas in years as it steps up efforts to ease energy shortages amid extreme summer heat.】

item.title: 摩根大通认为波动性上升导致套利交易失去吸引力
item.description: 摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：The appeal of currency carry trades may wane in the long term due to increased volatility and the prospect of a dovish turn by the Federal Reserve, according to JPMorgan Chase & Co.】

item.title: 受关税影响，Stellantis 或将部分中国电动汽车产品转移至欧洲
item.description: 如果本周宣布的电动汽车进口关税生效，Stellantis NV 公司将把中国 Leapmotor 公司生产的部分车型的生产转移到欧洲。【原文：Stellantis NV will shift production of some models made by China’s Leapmotor to Europe if tariffs on electric-vehicle imports announced this week go into effect.】

item.title: MUFG 因 "屡次 "滥用客户数据而面临处罚
item.description: 日本证券监察机构称，三菱日联金融集团公司（Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group Inc.【原文：Japan’s securities watchdog said Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group Inc.’s banking arm and its joint brokerage ventures with Morgan Stanley should be penalized after finding they broke firewalls between business units that protect client data.】

item.title: 狩猎数十亿美元的另类资产管理公司交易升温
item.description: 另类资产管理行业的整合步伐正在加快，主要参与者都在维护自己的主导地位并进行扩张。【原文：Consolidation is gathering pace in the alternative asset management industry as major players assert their dominance and expand.】
